name: Thor's Demise
description:
Endure Thor's demise

Thor's Demise is a top-down shooter where you need to kill enemies to prolong your death. Killing enemies gives you glory (score).

This game features:

  • Game mode where you need to kill to keep the timer going.
  • Three demon types, Fury, Ranger and Swarmer
  • Mjolnir, the hammer of Thor. You can fire it and return it when it comes to a stand still.

This game is designed for controller but you can pick mouse and keyboard if you choose to.

Controls - PS4 & Xbox controllers, Mouse and Keyboard

Left stick
WASDMove Player character
Right stick
Mouse
Aim player
Right Trigger/Bumper
Left Click
Shoot hammer/recall hammer
Left Trigger/Bumper
Right Click/Shift Key
Dash

I created this game as a project for Breda University Of Applied Sciences
